response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Our product is not just any commodity; it's an investment in your future success. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we estimate its true value to be around $800,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire our product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste for excellence and your commitment to growth. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 750000}
